package_json.name: @ryanatkn/fuz_template
package_json.description: a static web app and Node library template with TypeScript, Svelte, SvelteKit, Vite, esbuild, Fuz, and Gro

package_json.name: @ryanatkn/fuz_gitops
package_json.description: a tool for managing many repos

package_json.name: @ryanatkn/fuz_code
package_json.description: syntax highlighting using prismjs for Svelte, SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Fuz

package_json.name: @ryanatkn/fuz_mastodon
package_json.description: Mastodon components and helpers for Svelte, SvelteKit, and Fuz

package_json.name: @ryanatkn/gro
package_json.description: task runner and toolkit extending SvelteKit

scripts.build: rm -rf .gro dist && svelte-kit sync && svelte-package && chmod +x ./dist/gro.js && npm link -f
